item.title: My Pitch
item.description: What: Make a video game using pygame. Why: I like coding and I learned pygame a long time ago but didn’t use it. How: I will spend the first and second week making prodotypes. The third is art. The last is coding the game. Sucess: Making a video game that works and has a UI.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I made a python prototype to do a tic-tac-toe.
